程序包 com.xfy.scrolllayout

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    IDrawChildren
    支持3d绘图时，绘制子控件的接口 ScrollLayout.do3DAnim must true
    OnChangeListener
    Created by XiongFangyu on 17/1/22.
    TwoChildrenAdapter<V extends android.view.View>
    如果只有两个子view的话，需要设置adapter 如果更改了其中某个view的状态，必须调用ScrollLayout.notifyViewChanged(View)告知
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BaseTwoChildrenAdapter<V extends android.view.View>
    子类只需实现bindViewData(View, View)
    FadeDrawChildren
    Created by XiongFangyu on 17/1/22.
    FlipLikeRotateBox
    默认3d变换 像在翻一个箱子
    ScrollLayout
    Created by XiongFangyu on 17/1/10.
    ScrollLayout.LayoutParams  
  • 注释类型概要 
    注释类型 说明
    ScrollLayout.ScrollOrientation
